Description:
Position Title:             Production ManagerEmployment Type:     Full TimeSalary:                        up to 15K AED, all-inclusive depending on experience and qualifications, plus incentives and yearly bonusJob Location:             Dubai, UAE About the Client:A recognized F&B organization dedicated to creating incredible culinary experiences in UAE Job Description:Develop and manage production plans and schedules to meet output targets
Ensure food products meet safety and quality standards, adhering to regulations
Supervise kitchen staff, provide training, and oversee performance evaluations
Manage inventory, control production costs, and optimize efficiency
Implement food safety protocols, maintain compliance, and ensure safe kitchen operationsSkills
Skills:
Open to Arabic nationals
Male, 45 years old and below
At least 5 years of UAE experience in a senior role in central kitchens
Must have solid experience in mass food production and catering
Must have experience in multiple cuisines but with a solid Arabic/Lebanese background
Immediate joiners will be prioritized
